aarambhayedi sanwidhanayata shi්ra lankawa, indiyawa, pakisthanaya, ooste්raliyawa, nawasilanthaya, bi්rathanya saha kanadawa yana ratawal ayath wu athara, 1965 wasaredi mema yojana kramaya sandaha dayakathwaya labadimata amerika eksath janapadaya da ekangathwaya palakarana ladi. 1965 wasara wana wita dakunu ha agnidiga aasiyathika rajyayan kihipayakda mema sanwidhanayata ekwini.
